verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Words of worship, rise like a river within me newline And thoughts to express are so many newline Wanna bless You God newline Can't be silent, I think of the mercies You show me newline My lips begin overflowing newline Great is Your Love newline Such Gratitude newline for all that You do, Jesus to You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: At the top of my lungs I will sing Hallelujah newline You're the One who saved me, the One who gave me newline This life I live, forevermore, forevermore newline At the top of my lungs I will sing Hallelujah newline I'm not ashamed, I'll praise Your name newline Let the whole world know I love You Lord, I love You Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You are worthy, I join the song of creation newline That rings out across every nation newline Let my heart be heard newline I need You so newline I don't care who knows, from the depths of my soul
